en.title: Welcome
en.text: Join us for a workshop. Get insights from our developers on how to implement our APIs or SDKs. We end the session with a drink, cheers!

nl.title: Engagement Marketing Automation
nl.text: Discover the platform that delivers the most engaging messages and interactions. Every superhero needs a sidekick.
